title: What one present-day technology would have the biggest impact if it was invented in the early 1900s? - Quora

response.answer_text: The hydrogen bomb. Imagine what would have happened if the Germans had something like the USA W87 H bomb in World War I. Five hundred pounds and half a megaton. The Central Powers would have dropped them on Paris, Moscow, Rome, and London using Zeppelins. The Allies would have surrendered rather than see their whole countries be obliterated. Germany would quite literally rule the world. Everything we know about the history of the 20th century after World War I would be completely different.
